review: The device generally works quite well for viewing Amazon Prime and Netflix content.  However the primary reason I purchased it was to access HBO GO which is made available by the cable companies.  The device is compatible with a long list of cable companies, but not Charter (our provider).  Seems like Charter is one of the big ones so they need to get that compatibility in order.
